```{r plot 1}
library(tidyverse)

rstats_tweets <- readRDS(here::here("data", "rstats_tweets.rds"))

screen_name_count <- 
  rstats_tweets %>% 
  dplyr::count(screen_name)

screen_name_count <-
  screen_name_count %>% 
  dplyr::arrange(desc(n)) %>% 
  dplyr::top_n(25, n)

screen_name_count %>% 
  ggplot(aes(reorder(screen_name, n), n)) + 
  geom_col() + 
  coord_flip()

```
